title: Recruiting for Team
body:
Black Hole Gaming is recruiting for next season more specifically. 
We're going to try our luck on some ladders, but id love to get the team together now and practice. 
I'm currently in silver, im best at jungle and mid but i love playing adc.
im looking for dedicated players, fun people and people who don't give up easy.
fill this out and reply here or message me IG.
your log in details: (im kidding).
IG name:
Division:
Main Role:
Main Champs:
Backup Role:
Reason For Recruitment:
What Value Are You To The Team?:

thanks all,
Squats

Thanks for all the applications. Keep on commenting and ill be looking for Subs if someone isn't available.

replies.body:
IG name: Deep Sanity
Division: Bronze 2
Main Role: Jungle
Main Champs: Jg - Xin, Irelia, Shyvanna, Amumu, Rek Sai. Adc - Vayne, Jinx, Twitch, Ezreal, Tristana
Backup Role: Adc
Reason For Recruitment: kinda bored of soloQ want to learn more about 5s a bit more
What Value Are You To The Team?: Could be anything ;)

IG name: Tiltlords
Division: Silver 1 
Main Role: Jungle
Main Champs: Lee Sin is my man but I can honestly say I can play every jungler
Backup Role: Top
Reason For Recruitment: Have had a taste from playing in the OOL ladder, and vsing the challenger teams, and getting my ass kicked, made me want to improve and do what they do. 
What Value Are You To The Team?: I provide top banter, a good laugh and am very good at making shot calls if need be but can just as easily listen.

> [{quoted}](name=Tiltlords,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=h1JeXHA8,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2016-10-01T12:06:02.977+0000)
>
> IG name: Tiltlords
> Division: Silver 1 
> Main Role: Jungle
> Main Champs: Lee Sin is my man but I can honestly say I can play every jungler
> Backup Role: Top
> Reason For Recruitment: Have had a taste from playing in the OOL ladder, and vsing the challenger teams, and getting my ass kicked, made me want to improve and do what they do. 
> What Value Are You To The Team?: I provide top banter, a good laugh and am very good at making shot calls if need be but can just as easily listen.

Added you homie. Jungler was what i needed!

IG name:I Pew Pew U QQ
Division: Plat V
Main Role:Adc
Main Champs:Jinx,Vayne,Fiora,Quinn,Riven
Backup Role:Top
Reason For Recruitment: Been playing since season 1 and never been in an actual team before and thought I might aswell give it a go
What Value Are You To The Team?:  I play everyday, Super experienced in every role so I'm great if you need a filler or just help with a role in general. I never tilt but I dont take the game too seriously, I play to have fun but generally end up winning most the time.

IG name: Shiney
Division: Gold 1
Main Role: ADC
Main Champs: Kalista/Jhin/Lucian/Trist/Jinx/Cait/Sivir/Ezreal/Vayne
Backup Role: Mid
Reason For Recruitment: I Need a team that is serious about ranked 5's and want to progress as a team.
What Value Are You To The Team?: Working Mic, I have a TS server we can use. I can Shotcall incase anyone is shy/or are not vocal in team fights.

IG name: Klazingz
Division: Silver 1
Main Role: Support
Main Champs: Bard, Thresh, Braum, Leona, Blitzcrank, Soraka
Backup Role: Jungle
Reason For Recruitment: Just want a team to rely on
What Value Are You To The Team?: I think I have good understanding of the game which will be useful

IG name: Cakemeisting
Division: Bronze III
Main Role: Support
Main Champs: All supports except for Blitzcrank and Thresh
Backup Role: Top, ADC, Mid
Reason For Recruitment: Looking for some skilled play, unlike in solo-queue.
What Value Are You To The Team?: Shotcaller and available every day.

ig name: exuxia
division: bronze I
main role: jg
main champs {{champion:154}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:104}} {{champion:84}} and a few more
Backup: mid or top
Reason for recruitment: want to start climbing and work with a fun and co operative team
what value am i to the team: I know what we need to do to win a game, never give up and can come back for any time of the game

IG name: Fawnaby
Division: S5 atm, highest has been S1 
Main Role: Support
Main Champs: I can play all supports but mains/faves are {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:267}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:412}} 
Backup Role: Top/Jungle
Reason for Recruitment: Free 24/7 and looking to really improve on league with a team ^.^
What value are you to the team? Reliable (as im free anytime!), flexible, can play any support, good with map awareness and calls xD id like to say im pre funny too ;)

Hi!:) 
My IG Name is: Candy Chibi
Division is: BronzeV
Main Role : Support.
Main champs is: {{champion:37}} and {{champion:267}} 
Backup Role: ADC(Even if its my main i love to support)
Reason For Recrutement: I love to play with a team, and starting become a true one, and i like get better ranks with all the team together.
What Value Are You In The Team?: The losted person, but can play very well when she have a good team ^^

In-Game name: traloop
Division: Bronze 3
Main Role: Support
Main Champs: Can play every support well but I'm best at {{champion:201}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:267}} 
Backup Role: Fill, have a medium sized champion pool in all roles
Reason For Recruitment: I am a very team orientated player, I play best when i can easily communicate with teammates.
What Value Are You To The Team?: Good map awareness, Was in a gold 3 ranked team versing plat- diamond players so I can pull my weight.
